ComicInfo.Series: Star Trek: Deep Space Nine - Too Long a Sacrifice
ComicInfo.Summary: Too Long a Sacrifice [Part 4]: Odo and Retlaw identify the murderer, whom they pursue across the station before more innocents are killed.
